name: TomEE
body:
# Driven by David Blevins, TomEE has evolved a lot since its baby stages. Adimpression proudly uses TomEE for most of its servers. 

## Why? 

### Because TomEE is pure Tomcat with Java EE capabilities
### Because TomEE is open sourced
### Because TomEE is well documented
### Because TomEE is not messed up. Tomcat is taken clean and configured to be TomEE with minimal interference.
### Because TomEE is fully Apache software

## Where?

### Is it Friday already? Look here then: [http://ThankGodItIsFriday.com](http://ThankGodItIsFriday.com)

* On Facebook: [https://www.facebook.com/ThankGodItIsFriday](https://www.facebook.com/ThankGodItIsFriday)
* On Twitter: [https://twitter.com/tgifteam](https://twitter.com/tgifteam)
* On Wordpress: [http://tgifteam.wordpress.com](http://tgifteam.wordpress.com)
* On Foursquare: [https://foursquare.com/tgifteam](https://foursquare.com/tgifteam)
* On Google+: [https://plus.google.com/103812630775471841268](https://plus.google.com/103812630775471841268)
